Class DatabaseResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.iam.identity.foundation.AbstractLoggable

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>, oracle.hst.foundation.logging.Loggable

    public class DatabaseResource
extends oracle.iam.identity.connector.integration.TargetResource
    The DatabaseResource implements the base functionality of a Database IT Resource.
    Since:
    1.0.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • DatabaseResource

        public DatabaseResource(oracle.hst.foundation.logging.Loggable loggable,
                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameter)
                 throws oracle.iam.identity.foundation.TaskException
        Constructs a DatabaseResource which is associated with the specified Loggable for logging purpose.
        The IT Resource configuration will be populated from the specified Map and also all well known attributes.
        Parameters:
        loggable - the Loggable that instantiate this DatabaseResource configuration wrapper.
        Allowed object is Loggable.
        parameter - the Map providing the parameter of the IT Resource instance where this wrapper belongs to.
        Allowed object is Map where each element is of type String as the key and String as the value.
        Throws:
        oracle.iam.identity.foundation.TaskException - if one or more attributes are missing on the IT Resource instance.

    • Method Detail

      • databaseName

        public final java.lang.String databaseName()
        Returns the name of the database this IT Resource is configured for.

        Convenience method to shortens the access to the resource attribute Database.OIM.Resource.DATABASE_NAME.

        Returns:
        the name of the database this IT Resource is configured for. Possible object String.

      • databaseSchema

        public final java.lang.String databaseSchema()
        Returns the name of the cataloge schema of the database database.

        Convenience method to shortens the access to the configuration attribute Database.OIM.Resource.DATABASE_SCHEMA.

        Returns:
        the name of the cataloge schema of the database. Possible object String.

      • build

        public static DatabaseResource build(oracle.hst.foundation.logging.Loggable loggable,
                                     java.lang.Long instance)
                              throws oracle.iam.identity.foundation.TaskException
        Factory method to create a DatabaseResource which is associated with the specified task and belongs to the IT Resource specified by the given identifier.

        The IT Resource configuration will be populated from the repository of the Identity Manager and also all well known attributes using the specified instance key.

        Parameters:
        loggable - the Loggable that instantiate the DatabaseResource configuration wrapper.
        Allowed object is Loggable.
        instance - the internal identifier of an IT Resource in Identity Manager.
        Allowed object is Long.
        Returns:
        an populated IT Resource instance wrapped as DatabaseResource.
        Possible object is DatabaseResource.
        Throws:
        oracle.iam.identity.foundation.TaskException - if the IT Resource is not defined in the Identity Manager meta entries for the given key or one or more attributes are missing on the IT Resource instance.

      • build

        public static DatabaseResource build(oracle.hst.foundation.logging.Loggable loggable,
                                     java.lang.String instance)
                              throws oracle.iam.identity.foundation.TaskException
        Factory method to create a DatabaseResource which is associated with the specified task and belongs to the IT Resource specified by the given name.
        The IT Resource configuration will be populated from the repository of the Identity Manager and also all well known attributes using the specified instance name.
        Parameters:
        loggable - the Loggable that instantiate the DatabaseResource configuration wrapper.
        Allowed object is Loggable.
        instance - the name of the IT Resource instance where this wrapper belongs to.
        Allowed object is String.
        Returns:
        an populated IT Resource instance wrapped as DatabaseResource.
        Possible object is DatabaseResource.
        Throws:
        oracle.iam.identity.foundation.TaskException - if the IT Resource is not defined in the Identity manager meta entries for the given name or one or more attributes are missing on the IT Resource instance.

      • build

        public static DatabaseResource build(oracle.hst.foundation.logging.Loggable loggable,
                                     java.lang.String serverName,
                                     java.lang.String serverPort,
                                     java.lang.String databaseDriver,
                                     java.lang.String databaseName,
                                     java.lang.String databaseSchema,
                                     java.lang.String principalName,
                                     java.lang.String principalPassword,
                                     boolean secureSocket,
                                     java.lang.String localeLanguage,
                                     java.lang.String localeCountry,
                                     java.lang.String localeTimeZone,
                                     java.lang.String feature)
                              throws oracle.iam.identity.foundation.TaskException
        Factory method to create a DatabaseResource which is associated with the specified Loggable and belongs to the IT Resource specified by the given parameter.
        The IT Resource will be populated from the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        loggable - the Loggable that instantiate the DatabaseResource configuration wrapper.
        Allowed object is Loggable.
        serverName - the host name or IP address of the target system on which the database is deployed. IT Resource is configured for.
        Allowed object is String.
        serverPort - the port the database is listening on.
        Allowed object is String.
        databaseDriver - the type of the the target system database.
        Allowed object is String.
        databaseName - the name of the database as specified in the databaseUrl parameter.
        Allowed object is String.
        databaseSchema - the name of the cataloge schema of the database.
        Allowed object is String.
        principalName - the name of the database this IT Resource is configured for.
        Allowed object is String.
        principalPassword - the password of the target system account specified by the principalName parameter.
        Allowed object is String.
        secureSocket - specifies whether or not to use SSL to secure communication between Identity Manager and the target system.
        Allowed object is boolean.
        localeLanguage - Language code of the target system
        Default value: en
        Note: You must specify the value in lowercase.
        Allowed object is String.
        localeCountry - Country code of the target system
        Default value: US
        Note: You must specify the value in uppercase.
        Allowed object is String.
        localeTimeZone - use this parameter to specify the time zone of the target system. For example: GMT-08:00 and GMT+05:30.
        During a provisioning operation, the connector uses this time zone information to convert date-time values entered on the process form to date-time values relative to the time zone of the target system.
        Default value: GMT
        Allowed object is String.
        feature - the name of the Metadata Descriptor providing the target system specific features like objectClasses, attribute id's etc.
        Allowed object is String.
        Returns:
        an populated IT Resource instance wrapped as DatabaseResource.
        Possible object is DatabaseResource.
        Throws:
        oracle.iam.identity.foundation.TaskException - if one or more attributes are missing on the IT Resource instance.

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of this instance.
        Adjacent elements are separated by the character "\n" (line feed). Elements are converted to strings as by String.valueOf(Object).
        Overrides:

        Returns:
        the string representation of this instance.
